title: EQ21 RUN SHOES
subtitle: Performance
discription_head: LIGHTWEIGHT, CUSHIONED RUNNING SHOES FOR KIDS.
discription: Running around the backyard. Climbing trees at the park. When the world is their gym, these kids' shoes keeps them comfortable. The flexible upper rides on Bounce, a lightweight midsole for dynamic movement. Stretchy laces make these trainers easy to slip on, even if they haven't learned about bunny loops. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
details2: This product has been made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials using no virgin polyester.
value: adidas India Marketing Private Limited, Office no. 6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket no. 7, Plot no. 11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi - 110070

title: DURAMO SL SHOES
subtitle: Performance
discription_head: KIDS' RUNNING SHOES FOR EVERY DAY.
discription: It seems like kids are always on the move. For the future track star in your household, these running shoes deliver support and style. A breathable mesh upper and lightweight cushioning underfoot combine to keep their feet feeling cool and comfortable. The adidas 3-Stripes design completes the look. This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.
details1: Mesh upper with supportive no-sew overlays
details2: Cloudfoam midsole and soft neoprene heel
Color: Grey Six / Solar Red / Carbon

subtitle: Performance
discription_head: SLEEK SHOES FOR SPEED ON THE COURT.
discription: These kids' adidas tennis shoes were created to keep up with even the most energetic running. With low-profile midsole cushioning sitting on a grippy rubber outsole, they respond quickly to every sidestep and sudden change of direction. Their stretch-woven upper is designed with a foot-hugging fit to ensure your little superstar stays securely locked in. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
